mapper.select: select fb.fb_no, fb.fb_p_no, m.m_nickname, fb.fb_title, fb.fb_content, fb.fb_created_at, fb.fb_updated_at, fb.fb_read_count, (select count(*) from tmi_friend_board_attachment where fba_fb_no = fb.fb_no) attachCount from tmi_friend_board fb join tmi_member m on fb_m_email = m.m_email order by fb.fb_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into tmi_friend_board values (seq_pb_no.nextval, null, #{fb_m_email}, #{fb_title}, sysdate, sysdate, 0, #{fb_content})
